descriptions:
["Descriptionnu Avenue Real Estate is proud to present this stunning 5 bedroom Type 11 villa in the desirable community of Al Mahra, Arabian Ranches. This villa is in the perfect location and is immaculate throughout, making it the ideal family home.
There is a large, bright open living and dining area and an additional family living area next to the kitchen which opens out onto the beautifully landscaped garden.
Of the 5 bedrooms one is situated downstairs having an en-suite, making it ideal for guests. With floor to ceiling windows and an abundance of natural light and a marble stair case this villa has a modern and contemporary feel throughout.
Upstairs is home to 4 large bedrooms and another family area which can be used as a study or children's play area.
To the rear of the property there is a beautifully landscaped garden. With peaceful surroundings and a private location, this is the ideal spot for relaxing, entertaining guests and hosting parties.
This really is a MUST SEE villa!
Private location
5 Bedrooms + Maids room
Immaculate throughout
BUA: 4,847 sq.ft.

NU Avenue Real Estate

1201 DAMAC Executive Heights, Barsha Heights, Dubai, UAE"]

amenities: ['View of Landmark\nView of Water']
descriptions:
["DescriptionNareel Island
​Nareel Island is a Plot Sales Development exclusively reserved for UAE Nationals​​. 
Located off the Capital's coast in Al Bateen, Nareel invites the UAE's elite to create a personal legacy through a unique opportunity to purchase land and build a home for generations to come.
Nareel will be home to a tranquil yet active neighbourhood with a swimming lagoon, club house and open parks across the Island. It will further benefit from private beaches, pontoons, gardens and driveways creating an exclusive living experience for UAE families within a gated community.  
With 148 plots on the island, Nareel will truly be a limited opportunity reserved for a few UAE Nationals only.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionA Creative Urban Sanctuary
Your sanctuary within the city you love, Bloom Towers is close to everything but far from ordinary.  Located on the edge of JVC, one of Dubai's most popular and exciting young communities, it is moments away from lush parks and community facilities, as well as shopping leisure to suit every taste.  Its prime position on the edge of JVC ensures easy in and out access to the city's main arteries and all your favorite spots around Dubai. 
Modern Living Re - imagined
 A celebration of Dubai 's limitless energy and ambition, Bloom Towers is Bloom' s new vision of connected living for Dubai 's young and young at heart.  Immersing you in a world where time flows at the speed of conversation, every space catalyzes collaboration, and your physical and digital worlds coexist in perfect harmony, it promises a vibrant and versatile hub of creativity for you to call home. 
 Ideal Location
 Rising high above verdant vistas with the iconic skyline of Dubai on the horizon beyond, Bloom Towers puts you within minutes of the city's finest leisure, dining and entertainment destinations.
 Emirates Hills: 5 minutes
 Dubai Media / Internet City - 16 minutes

descriptions:
['DescriptionFeatures
•    Centralized air conditioning, upgraded kitchen cabinets, and built-in wardrobes
•    Large terraces
•    Direct access to the prestine beach, swimming pools, gardens, open kids play area 
•    Gate access control system with 24-hour security
•    Covered car parking
•    Located on Al Marjan Island next to five-star hotels: Rixos Bab Al Bahr, DoubleTree by Hilton Resort & Spa and Marjan 
     Island Resort&Spa
•    Close to Shopping Mall, Hospitals, International Schools, Championship Golf Course, Sailing club and Marina.
•    Easy access to three highways, Airports and Free-trade zones
•    Peaceful and secure community 
The Bab Al Bahr Residences comprise three pyramid-shaped buildings, each flowing to the next and acting as one water-front complex, incorporating a main central courtyard with a large swimming pool, complemented by lush walkways and gardens.
This resort-like residential project is home to spacious studios, one, two, three bedrooms apartments and penthouses, complete with balconies, terraces and outdoor areas offering spectacular views of the Arabian Gulf, Al Marjan Island and Ras Al Khaimah beach-front.
